channel.title: Help me with dragon platebody!
channel.description:
I really need some help i added the dragon plate body into the client but now the sleeves are all retarded!!!! heres a pic
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/14d3ne1.png[/img]
now here is the ints
if(i == 11245) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anInt174 = 10672; // Drop/Inv Model class8.anInt165 = 10673; // Male Wield Model class8.anInt200 = 10673; // Female Wield class8.anInt188 = 10673; // Male arms/sleeves class8.anInt164 = 10673; // Female arms/sleeves class8.anInt181 = 800; // Zoom class8.anInt190 = 498; // Rotate up/down class8.anInt198 = 1300; // Rotate right/left class8.anInt169 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move right class8.anInt194 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move up class8.aString170 = "Owner plate body"; // Item Name class8.aByteArray178 = "Pretty sweet aye?".getBytes(); // Item Examine
PLZ HELP ME
also im not sure if i added it in dat correctly have a look
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/o7ulwh.png[/img]

item.title: Help me with dragon platebody!
item.dc:creator: @Owned_Pl0xs Owned_Pl0xs
item.description:
@Owned_Pl0xs wrote:

Go to the item class.

In there, find:

public static int platebody[] = {

In that array, add the item ID of the dragon platebody.

Read full topic

item.title: Help me with dragon platebody!
item.dc:creator: @santa_p_hat santa p hat
item.description:
@santa_p_hat wrote:

I really need some help i added the dragon plate body into the client but now the sleeves are all retarded!!! heres a pic

14d3ne1.png765×503

now here is the ints

if(i == 11245)
{
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Wear”;
class8.anInt174 = 10672; // Drop/Inv Model
class8.anInt165 = 10673; // Male Wield Model
class8.anInt200 = 10673; // Female Wield
class8.anInt188 = 10673; // Male arms/sleeves
class8.anInt164 = 10673; // Female arms/sleeves
class8.anInt181 = 800; // Zoom
class8.anInt190 = 498; // Rotate up/down
class8.anInt198 = 1300; // Rotate right/left
class8.anInt169 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move right
class8.anInt194 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move up
class8.aString170 = “Owner plate body”; // Item Name
class8.aByteArray178 = “Pretty sweet aye?”.getBytes(); // Item Examine

PLZ HELP ME

also im not sure if i added it in dat correctly have a look
